content.rendered: Mr. Janitorial Supplies is proud to announce that we can now supply and service all of your commercial Laundry and Kitchen needs.  From dispensing units to chemicals, we have a full time technician to install and maintain your equipment.  Please contact us today for any inquiries you may have.
